about_the_game:
We are proud to introduce a new set of truck tyres and truck accessories, officially licensed from Michelin to Euro Truck Simulator 2. We are complementing them by several "aftermarket" goodies and paintjobs to create a mix that should bring a smile to every Michelin fan's face.

Michelin is one of the largest tyre manufacturers in the world, acknowledged as an innovator with a history spanning over 120 years. Michelin's brand identity is immediately recognizable. The symbol of the company - Bibendum, the Michelin Man - is one of the world's oldest trademarks.

The content of this DLC includes:

Front Tyres
• 315/70 Michelin X Line Energy Z
• 385/65 Michelin X Line Energy F
• 385/55 Michelin X Line Energy F
• 385/55 Michelin XFA2
• 315/70 Michelin X MultiWay 3D XZE
• 315/80 Michelin X MultiWay 3D XZE
• 315/70 Michelin X Line Energy Z (2020)
• 315/70 Michelin X Multi Energy Z
• 385/55 Michelin X Multi F
• 385/55 Michelin X Line Energy F (2020)

Rear Tyres
• 315/70 Michelin X Line Energy Z
• 315/70 Michelin X Line Energy D 2
• 315/70 Michelin X MultiWay 3D XZE
• 315/80 Michelin X MultiWay 3D XZE
• 315/70 Michelin X MultiWay 3D XDE
• 315/80 Michelin X MultiWay 3D XDE
• 315/70 Michelin X Multi D
• 315/70 Michelin X Multi HD D
• 315/70 Michelin X Multi Energy Z
• 315/70 Michelin X Line Energy Z (2020)

Trailer Tyres
• 385/55 Michelin X Multi T
• 385/55 Michelin X Line Energy T
• 385/65 Michelin X Multi HL T
• 385/65 Michelin X Multi HL Z (2020)

Bonus Paint Jobs
• Bibendum
• Michelin Tracks
• Bibendum 2021
• Michelin Tracks 2021

Trailer Paint Jobs
• Bibendum 2021
• Michelin Tracks 2021

Truck tuning & accessories
• Bibendum Roof Figure
• Bibendum Dashboard Figure
• Square Flag
• Triangle Flag
• Tea Cup
• Hanging Bibendum Figure
• Air Freshener
• Baseball Cap
• Michelin Air Freshner II
• Michelin Bag
• Michelin Bottle
• Michelin Cap 2020
• Michelin Coat
• Michelin Coffee Mug 2020
• Michelin Glasses
• Michelin Gloves
• Michelin Light Board
• Michelin Notebook

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class (Intel HD 4000)
  • Hard Drive: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: recent binary ATI or NVidia drivers (MESA may not work reliably)
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760-class (2 GB)
  • Hard Drive: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: recent binary ATI or NVidia drivers (MESA may not work reliably)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9 (Mavericks)
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class (Intel HD 4000)
  • Hard Drive: 3 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.10 (Yosemite)
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760-class (Intel HD 5300)
  • Hard Drive: 3 GB available space

  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760-class (2 GB)
  • Hard Drive: 3 GB available space
